glsa.title: libgcrypt: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been fixed in libgcrypt,the worst of which results in predictable output from the random number generator.

background.p: libgcrypt is a general purpose cryptographic library derived out of GnuPG.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libgcrypt. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Side-channel attacks can leak private key information. A separate critical bug allows an attacker who obtains 4640 bits from the RNG to trivially predict the next 160 bits of output.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libgcrypt users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Factoring RSA Keys With TLS Perfect Forward Secrecy
